fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Pick 2 players each night, silently give them your first attribute permanently.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Good players will be roleblocked whenever they attempt to use your attributes.
- If you don't use an ability on a night, you may act twice on the next one.
- Your targets will learn about the attribute if they do nothing on a night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.
